eng_word: What am I going to do?”

eng_before: What am I going to do?”

eng_after: so that they will go in
and I have set you apart

eng_before: You are to regard him as holy,
by allowing the people to eat
I must be acknowledged as holy

eng_after: that you would no longer be
and as surely as the whole
and I will become as weak
that you may buy it back
May the LORD show you loving devotion

eng_before: May the LORD show you loving devotion
so that we may hang them
who has opened her home to me

eng_after: and I will carry it out
